name: Knossos (itch) (sergeev_sergey99, Zero_SideStorm, OchPuch)
description:
Going down into the maze, people wanted to find the treasure of the great engineer. Like many, they did not believe in fairy tales about ancient monsters. However, one of them managed to survive...

Controls:
wasd/arrows - move
q/e - platform turn (left/right)
Esc - menu
push button "end turn" to next turn
